item.title: Old overgrown tree leaning into gardens, 3rd May
item.description:
The tree produces apples which fall into my garden, it restricts the amount of sunlight I get and it is also in danger of damaging my garden fence panels as it leans over so much. Behind garden of house 24, Prince Albert Court

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince Albert Court, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Fri 2nd May, all street lights out on Pilley Crescent, 3rd May
item.description:
All the street lights on Pilley crescent are still out. It has been days now. Extremely unsafe at night. I can see specifically from house number 1 to number 41 all street lights are not working. Presume the rest of the crescent is the same. Please contact residents with a reason and updates please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Out walking today I walked into a sign that is far too low on the lamppost and almost knocked myself out whilst also receiving a cut to the head. I have photographs of the post and the damage to my head but are unable to share these on this platform. The post is located on the Charlton Lane / Greenhills Road, close to the mini roundabout. The post contains a sign for the Zebra Crossing and Leckhampton Cycle Information, the latter being the sign that is way too low. I would be grateful if this could be addressed to avoid any further danger to pedestrians. Many thanks., 2nd May
item.description:
Out walking today I walked into a sign that is far too low on the lamppost and almost knocked myself out whilst also receiving a cut to the head. I have photographs of the post and the damage to my head but are unable to share these on this platform. The post is located on the Charlton Lane / Greenhills Road, close to the mini roundabout. The post contains a sign for the Zebra Crossing and Leckhampton Cycle Information, the latter being the sign that is way too low. I would be grateful if this could be addressed to avoid any further danger to pedestrians. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83, Charlton Lane, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW6 problem, 2nd May
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet
